title: Weird clicking lag
body:
This started happening after the preseason update though im not sure if the patch has something to do with it .Whenever i try to auto attack something (minion or champion) the character just stops there and does nothing as if i didnt click on the minion . Also this can happen when i move around the lane . I click on some point but the character doesnt do anything.The really weird part is that this seems to happen mostly around the lane meaning when i go to base and click around to test , the character seems responding .I have good ping and fps capped at 80 all game long .Also i dont think this is packet loss as everything else is ok as i can throw abilites just fine and there is no other lag .Is it my mouse maybe? 
Pls help i cant even cs.

replies.body: Ahhhhh that sounds almost like a perfect example of what happens when your connection is having issues with packet loss. Let's run a quick test for that using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to run a trace to the EUNE server at 31.186.224.42. Post the results here so I can take a look and figure out how we should fix this!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ee3XhoVq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-21T03:29:27.984+0000)
>
> Ahhhhh that sounds almost like a perfect example of what happens when your connection is having issues with packet loss. Let's run a quick test for that using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to run a trace to the EUNE server at 31.186.224.42. Post the results here so I can take a look and figure out how we should fix this!

eh no point 
if its packet loss then its my isp's fault 
also this doesnt happen all the time so the results may be inaccurate
thanks tho
